appsgate.lig.main.impl
Class Appsgate

java.lang.Object
  org.cybergarage.upnp.Device
      appsgate.lig.main.impl.Appsgate
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppsGateSpec, org.cybergarage.http.HTTPRequestListener, org.cybergarage.upnp.control.ActionListener, org.cybergarage.upnp.control.QueryListener, org.cybergarage.upnp.device.SearchListener
public class Appsgate
extends org.cybergarage.upnp.Device
implements AppsGateSpec, org.cybergarage.upnp.control.ActionListener, org.cybergarage.upnp.control.QueryListener

This class is the central component for AppsGate server. It allow client part to make methods call from HMI managers. It expose Appsgate server as an UPnP device to gather informations about it through the SSDP discovery protocol

Since:
April 23, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard
